snippet.title: Sucker for Love: Date to Die For (Teaser Trailer)
snippet.description:
That's what I'm Fhtagn about!  Sucker for Love is back with a new installment featuring new gods, a new playable character, and all-new threats!  Inspired by Shadow over Innsmouth and Dunwich horror, this all-new game will pit you against an entire town of demi-humans coming to take your Necronomicon, by any means necessary.  


Buy Sucker for Love: First Date:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574270/Sucker_for_Love_First_Date/

Follow AkaBaka:
https://twitter.com/ChromatoseDev

Follow DreadXP:
https://twitter.com/DreadXP_

Checkout more of our games here:
https://www.dreadxp.com/
